errors.error_description: Added installation step for pytest before running tests, creating logical order error by requiring dependency installation in testing section
correction_candidates: The unit tests in mpmath/tests/ can be run with `pytest <https://pytest.org/>`_, see the main documentation.
The unit tests in mpmath/tests/ can be run using pytest. Install it with ``pip install pytest`` if not already available, then run ``pytest mpmath/tests/``.

Run the unit tests located in mpmath/tests/ using ``python -m pytest`` after ensuring pytest is installed in your environment.
errors.golden_answer: The unit tests in mpmath/tests/ can be run with `pytest <https://pytest.org/>`_, see the main documentation.
